title: Train fault causing delays on North-South Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 北南线列车故障导致延误
title_translations.ms: Kerosakan kereta api menyebabkan kelewatan di Laluan North-South
title_translations.ta: வடக்கு-தெற்கு பாதையில் தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும் ரயில் கோளாறு

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train services from #Yishun towards #Bishan have resumed. Free regular bus services have ceased.
[NSL]UPDATE:Fault cleared, trains are progressively returning to normal speed.
[NSL]: Due to a train fault, pls add 30mins travel time from #Yishun to #Bishan towards #MarinaSouthPier. Train service is still available.
